ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: The robe with +5 CHA for 2-3 pp that you are thinking of is just a silk evening shirt available from the woman merchant in the marketplace next to the Lion s
ygData.messageBody:
The "robe" with +5 CHA for 2-3 pp that you are thinking of is just a
silk evening shirt available from the woman merchant in the marketplace next
to the Lion's Mane Inn in South Qeynos. No AC, just +5 CHA.

In a message dated 7/10/99 4:54:43 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
eqenchanters@onelist.com writes:

<< Date: Fri, 9 Jul 1999 19:04:03 -0700 (PDT)
From: Wanderer CommonWealth <wanderercw@...>
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only robes

ya know there is a robe out there that has +5 charisma which is very useful
for enchanters more useful than a +2 mana.
It's a tunic looks like you have nothing on <good so people think you just
died>
you can buy it for about 2pp-3pp depends on your charisma.
Send me an e-mail if you would like to know where it is.
wanderercw@...
The Wanderer >>
